articles.title: 2 people dead and several injured in a shooting and fire at a Michigan church, police say
articles.description:
After the suspect left the church, two officers pursued him and “engaged in gunfire,” Chief William Renye said. The man was killed.

The post 2 people dead and several injured in a shooting and fire at a Michigan church, police say appeared first on Boston.com.
